name: Fateweaver
description: Oracles who have mastered the manipulation of destiny and can weave the threads of fate to create powerful effects that alter reality itself.

resource_systems.name: Mana
resource_systems.description: Mystical energy that powers divination spells and prophecies
resource_systems.regeneration: 2 per 6 seconds, +3 when successfully predicting an event
mechanics: Mana points are spent to cast divination spells and invoke prophecies
Some abilities require maintaining a connection to the future, consuming mana over time
Meditation increases mana regeneration rate by 400% but prevents movement
Can channel mana into fate threads to strengthen destiny manipulation

resource_systems.name: Fate Points
resource_systems.description: Accumulated knowledge of possible futures that can be spent to alter destiny
resource_systems.regeneration: 2 per long rest, additional points gained through significant divinations
mechanics: Fate Points can be spent to reroll dice for self or allies
Can be used to force a critical success or failure on a single action
Powerful destiny-altering abilities consume multiple Fate Points
Can be invested in long-term prophecies for greater future effects

resource_systems.name: Destiny Threads
resource_systems.description: Tangible manifestations of fate that can be manipulated to create powerful effects
resource_systems.regeneration: 1 per hour, additional threads gained when significant events align with predictions
mechanics: Threads can be woven into patterns that create various magical effects
Can be attached to individuals to influence their destiny
More complex patterns require more threads but produce more powerful effects
Threads can be sacrificed to immediately alter the outcome of a critical event

class_mechanics.name: Advanced Divination
class_mechanics.description: Mastery of techniques to glimpse possible futures with greater clarity and detail
effects: Divination spells reveal more detailed and accurate information
Can perceive multiple possible futures simultaneously
Divinations can target specific aspects of the future with precision
Successful divinations grant significant bonuses to related skill checks

class_mechanics.name: Grand Prophecy
class_mechanics.description: The ability to declare powerful prophecies that shape events on a larger scale
effects: Prophecies affect larger areas and more targets
Self-fulfilling prophecies provide more powerful buffs when conditions are met
Doom prophecies apply stronger debuffs to enemies when triggered
Can declare prophecies that affect entire regions or organizations

class_mechanics.name: Destiny Manipulation
class_mechanics.description: Direct control over the threads of fate to alter reality
effects: Can significantly alter the outcome of events by manipulating probability
Provides strong passive bonuses to saving throws and resistance checks
Can protect multiple allies from critical hits simultaneously
Can temporarily change a target's destined path

class_mechanics.name: Tapestry Vision
class_mechanics.description: The ability to perceive the interconnected web of fate that binds all beings
effects: Can see connections between seemingly unrelated events
Identifies key individuals who are nexus points in the tapestry of fate
Reveals vulnerabilities in destiny patterns that can be exploited
Grants immunity to fate manipulation attempts by others

skill_trees.name: Master Seer
key_abilities: Omniscient Eye: Gain complete information about a target's past, present, and possible futures
Fate Scrying: View the destiny threads of individuals or locations across vast distances
Perfect Portent: Predict the exact outcome of complex events with perfect accuracy

skill_trees.name: Grand Prophet
key_abilities: World-Shaking Proclamation: Declare a prophecy that affects an entire region
Inevitable Doom: Curse enemies with inescapable fate that manifests regardless of their actions
Destiny Rewrite: Completely change the destined path of a willing subject

skill_trees.name: Destiny Architect
key_abilities: Reality Weave: Create complex patterns of destiny threads to produce powerful magical effects
Fate Severing: Completely cut a target's connection to their destined path
Tapestry Manipulation: Rearrange the connections between individuals to create new destiny patterns

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 5 points in any oracle skill tree
challenges: Successfully predict the outcome of a major event

hero_classes.name: Oracle of Light
hero_classes.description: Fateweavers who use their powers to guide others toward positive destinies and protect the world from calamity.

hero_classes.name: Cosmic Seer
hero_classes.description: Fateweavers who observe the grand tapestry of fate with detachment, seeking perfect knowledge of all possible futures.

hero_classes.name: Doom Prophet
hero_classes.description: Fateweavers who manipulate destiny to bring about catastrophe and rule through fear of their terrible predictions.

legendary_items.name: Crystal of Perfect Clarity
effects: Divination spells cost 25% less mana
Reveals one additional possible future when scrying
Grants immunity to deception and illusion magic

legendary_items.name: Loom of Destiny
effects: Maximum Destiny Threads increased by 5
Destiny Thread regeneration increased by 1 per hour
Can weave more complex fate patterns with fewer threads

lore: Fateweavers represent the pinnacle of oracular power, having transcended mere glimpses of the future to achieve direct manipulation of destiny itself. Through years of study and meditation, they have learned to perceive the complex tapestry of fate that binds all living beings and events. More importantly, they have mastered the art of manipulating these threads, weaving new patterns that alter reality according to their will. Some Fateweavers use this power benevolently, guiding individuals and nations toward prosperity and peace. Others maintain a neutral stance, observing the grand design with detachment and intervening only to maintain cosmic balance. A few turn their abilities toward darker purposes, using their knowledge of future events to manipulate others and weaving patterns of destruction and suffering. Regardless of their moral alignment, all Fateweavers command tremendous respect and fear, as their proclamations can literally shape the future of the world.
